eight million hiv-positive people and
we're not entirely sure what percentage
of those are resistant to their drugs
but it will be a significant percentage
our organization's mission is to provide
access or enable access for everybody
for genetic diagnostics so these are
Diagnostics that use DNA sequencing to

the examples of how we do this is DNA
sequencing for HIV this enables
clinicians to prescribe the right drugs
for individuals who are HIV positive
currently in resource-limited countries
such as South Africa there is no HIV
drug resistance testing done routinely
and the reason for this is is cost and
so we work with various companies to
reduce the cost of HIV drug resistance
testing and thereby provide access
globally for these types of Diagnostics
we do everything that you could think of
in terms of web hosting api's and

because of the security that it provides
which is its own entire issue we believe
in general that the cloud is more secure

better DDoS and we can roll our own so
working with AWS has been great because
they've really seen our vision of
scaling our product to global products
we are a South African company but we
really want to scale globally and we are
scaling globally and without AWS and the

of our solutions and continuing to
support us as we go forward this would
have been a much harder process we see
ourselves growing towards being a
